title: Vodafone Idea partners with Rakesh Jhunjhunwala-backed Nazara Tech to foray into mobile gaming - Business Insider India
content: Vodafone Idea partners with Rakesh Jhunjhunwala-backed Nazara Tech to foray into mobile gaming  Business Insider India
description: Vodafone Idea today announced a partnership with Rakesh Jhunjhunwala-backed Nazara Technologies, launching a new service called Vi Games. This new gaming service will offer over 1,200 games to Vodafone Idea subscribers across free and premium tiers. Vodafone Idea’s partnership with Nazara comes at a time when the telco is struggling to retain subscribers – it has lost over 67 million subscribers since January 2020.
